scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run deploy:all
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:common && npm run deploy:core && npm run deploy:routing && npm run deploy:api && npm run deploy:ui && npm run deploy:hosting && npm run deploy:elements && npm run deploy:solutions && npm run deploy:apps
scripts.deploy:api: npm version patch --prefix projects/api && ng build api && npm publish ./dist/api --access public
scripts.deploy:apps: npm version patch --prefix projects/apps && ng build apps && npm publish ./dist/apps --access public
scripts.deploy:common: npm version patch --prefix projects/common && ng build common && npm publish ./dist/common --access public
scripts.deploy:core: npm version patch --prefix projects/core && ng build core && npm publish ./dist/core --access public
scripts.deploy:elements: npm version patch --prefix projects/elements && ng build elements && npm publish ./dist/elements --access public
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm version patch --prefix projects/hosting && ng build hosting && npm publish ./dist/hosting --access public
scripts.deploy:routing: npm version patch --prefix projects/routing && ng build routing && npm publish ./dist/routing --access public
scripts.deploy:solutions: npm version patch --prefix projects/solutions && ng build solutions && npm publish ./dist/solutions --access public
scripts.deploy:ui: npm version patch --prefix projects/ui && ng build ui && npm publish ./dist/ui --access public
